                                🧠 SMART FEATURES
================================================================================

✅ Real-time Volatility Analysis
   - Automatically detects market conditions (Low/Normal/High/Extreme)
   - Adapts trading thresholds based on volatility
   - Learns from price history patterns

✅ Smart DIP Buying (4-Tier System)
   - Small DIPs: 0.5x position size
   - Medium DIPs: 1x position size  
   - Large DIPs: 1.5x position size
   - Extreme DIPs: 2x position size

✅ Smart Profit Taking (5-Tier System)
   - Quick profits: Early exit on small gains
   - Normal profits: Target-based selling
   - Good profits: Enhanced gains
   - Excellent profits: Major wins
   - Extreme profits: Emergency exits on huge pumps

✅ Dynamic Position Sizing
   - Bigger opportunities = Bigger positions
   - Automatic risk adjustment
   - Volatility-based scaling

✅ Average Price Protection
   - Never buys above your average entry price
   - Improves position with every purchase
   - Smart DCA (Dollar Cost Averaging)

✅ Lightning Fast Auto-Sell
   - Immediate execution when profit targets reached
   - No manual intervention needed
   - Seizes opportunities before they disappear

✅ Telegram Integration
   - Real-time trade notifications
   - Profit/loss alerts
   - Market volatility updates
   - Position status reports

================================================================================
                               🚀 INSTALLATION
================================================================================

Quick Install (Linux/macOS):
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/your-repo/algoritmit-smart-volatility-v4.0/main/install-smart-volatility.sh | bash

Manual Install:
1. Extract package files
2. Run: ./install-smart-volatility.sh
3. Configure .env file
4. Start: ./start-bot.sh

                              ⚙️ REQUIREMENTS
================================================================================

System Requirements:
- Node.js 18+ (auto-installed)
- 2GB RAM minimum
- Internet connection
- Linux/macOS/Windows (WSL)

Trading Requirements:
- Worldchain wallet with WLD
- Private key (keep secure!)
- RPC endpoint (provided)
- Small test amount (0.05-0.1 WLD recommended)
